name: Food Surplus
description: Local crops thrive, hunters do very well, or livestock numbers are greater than expected. If this event occurs, it immediately ends any ongoing food shortage event.

criticalSuccess.msg: Your bumper crops include wild harvests that allow you to skip the entire Pay Consumption step of the Upkeep phase of your next Kingdom turn. Gain 1d6 Food Commodities.

success.msg: Your excess crops lead to increased supplies. Treat your Consumption during the next Kingdom turn as 2 lower than its actual score and gain 1d6 Food Commodities.

failure.msg: The food surplus isn’t as huge as you’d expected. Treat your Consumption during the next turn as 1 lower than its actual score.

criticalFailure.msg: What you thought was an excess of food is infested with spoilage, ergot, or other contamination. Increase Unrest by 1 and one Ruin of your choice by1.
